channel.title: How fix doors?
channel.description: Guys how do you fix doors? cuz i'm makin a tut, and its a dungeon, basically need for doors to work, cause they do nothing :eek: so ye, any1 can help me?[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 08:16:42 PM[/size][hr]______________________________________________________________ \/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 08:18:50 PM[/size][hr]omg no one knows

item.title: How fix doors?
item.dc:creator: @THeNiNJa THeNiNJa
item.description:
@THeNiNJa wrote:

Maybe we can help each other. I need the codes for grass and path. If you have made your own dungeon that should be easy for you.
Anyways he it is

if(objectX == #### && objectY == #### && objectID == ####)//closed door/gate
{
ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,####, -1);
}
if(objectX == #### && objectY == #### && objectID == ####)//opened door/gate
{
ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,####, -2);
}

Read full topic
